es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.vectorizers

Class TextVectorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.vectorizers.TextVectorizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Vectorizer<TextItem>

    public class TextVectorizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vectorizer<TextItem>
    TextVectorizer.

    Vectorizes a text item. To do so, the vectorizer requires a sorted list of words and returns an array of bits specifying whether the item contains each of these words.

    Author:
    Alejandro Baldominos

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextVectorizer

        public TextVectorizer(java.lang.String[] features)

        Builds a new text vectorized, which receives as input an array of features (words), which is converted to the map representation.

        Parameters:
        features - the array of words which represent the individual features.

    • Method Detail

      • vectorize

        public Bit[] vectorize(TextItem item)

        Vectorizes the text item.

        To do so, an array of bits is built, where a 1 in the position i means that the word at position i in the original feature array is present in the item, and a 0 represent the opposite case.

        Specified by:
        vectorize in interface Vectorizer<TextItem>
        Parameters:
        item - the text item to be vectorized.
        Returns:
        an array of bits representing the text item.
